CustomField.description: BKP AN April 04 2020 if(LEFT(Territory_Number__c,3) = "900", NULL, if(Territory_Number__c = "800205", "DNA", CASE(Role__c, "ASR", "ASR", "MDM", "MDM", "KAM", "KAM", "Sales Manager", "RSM", "Sales Director", "DIR", "Sales VP", "VP", "REP") ))
